    "class Parrot:\n",
    "\n",
    "    # class attribute\n",
    "    _species = \"bird\"\n",
    "    _age=21\n",
    "    _us=\"World\"\n",
    "    \n",
    "    # instance attribute\n",
    "    def __init__(self, name, age):\n",
    "        self.name = name\n",
    "        self.age = age\n",
    "        self.group=__class__._species\n",
    "        \n",
    "        \n",
    "    def __add__(self, n1, n2):\n",
    "        self.n1 = n1\n",
    "        self.n2 = n2\n",
    "        return n1+n2+self._age\n",
    "    \n",
    "\n",
    "class Hen(Parrot):\n",
    "    #age=210\n",
    "    def __init__(self, name, age, weight):\n",
    "        self.name = name\n",
    "        self.age = age\n",
    "        self.weight = weight\n",
    "        print(__class__._age)\n",
    "\n",
    "# instantiate the Parrot class\n",
    "blu = Parrot(\"tini\",2)\n",
    "k=blu.__add__(10,10)\n",
    "print(\"******{}*******\\n\".format(k))\n",
    "woo = Parrot(\"Woo\", 15)\n",
    "sugna = Hen(\"chi\", 5, 1)\n",
    "\n",
    "# access the class attributes\n",
    "print(\"Blu is a {}\".format(blu.__class__._species))\n",
    "print(\"Woo is also a {}\".format(woo._species))\n",
    "print(\"Sugna is also a {}\".format(sugna.__class__._species))\n",
    "\n",
    "# access the instance attributes\n",
    "print(\"{} is {} years old and it is a {}\".format( blu.name, blu.age, blu.group))\n",
    "print(\"{} is {} years old and it is a {}\".format( woo.name, woo.age, woo.group))\n",
    "print(\"{} is {} years old of {} kg and it is a {}\".format( sugna.name, woo.age, sugna.weight, sugna._species))"
   ]
  }
